snippet: In New York, one man was arrested and at least one shoe hurled at President Ali Abdullah Saleh, who is in the United States for medical treatment.
abstract: Man is arrested after a protest in New York City at which a least one shoe was thrown at Yemeni president, Ali Abdullah Saleh; Saleh is in the United States to be treated for injuries he suffered when a bomb exploded in the mosque of the presidential palace in June.
lead_paragraph: In New York, one man was arrested and at least one shoe hurled at President Ali Abdullah Saleh, who is in the United States for medical treatment.

headline.seo: Manhattan Protesters Jeer Ali Abdullah Saleh, Yemen’s President
headline.main: Protesters Hurl Jeers and a Shoe at the Yemeni President
headline.print_headline: Protesters Hurl Jeers and a Shoe at the Yemeni President
